data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Hodh el Gharbi who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hodh el Gharbi, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 297 believers in Hodh el Gharbi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary: On average, 82 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Hodh el Gharbi, Mauritania.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Hodh el Gharbi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 243,200 citizens of Hodh el Gharbi, Mauritania, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, 1.9% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Hodh el Gharbi, Mauritania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 297 believers in Hodh el Gharbi to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hodh el Gharbi, Mauritania has a population of 243,200.

We estimate Hodh el Gharbi has 297 people who might know Jesus, 372 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 242,531 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 818 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Hodh el Gharbi. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
